channel.title: cucumber on Ramblings of a cloud engineer
channel.description: Recent content in cucumber on Ramblings of a cloud engineer

item.title: When cucumber goes wrong
item.description:
Hi,

Let’s face the horrible truth:

It’s rare / never happens that a manager / scrum master / product owner actually reads your cucumber test cases.
